Description:
Job Title: Commercial Credit Analyst

Job Type: Full-time

Location: Virginia Beach, Virginia, St. George, Utah or Salt Lake City, Utah 

All of us at Chartway stand united in our strong culture of listening and learning. We treat people with respect, integrity, and kindness, and are committed to continuously developing a diverse and inclusive workplace where team members are empowered to be their authentic selves. All backgrounds, viewpoints, and life experiences are welcome, knowing this commitment strengthens our credit union family and communities.

The Commercial Credit Analyst is responsible to the Business Lending Leader for the underwriting of new commercial loan requests, modifications of existing loans, and for the annual review of existing loans within the portfolio, while ensuring all federal regulations and laws are followed.

Responsible And Accountable For

 Working closely with commercial loan officers, borrowers, and guarantors to obtain relevant documentation to effectively review and evaluate commercial loan requests  Conduct in-depth review of loan application documents including rent rolls, leases, balance sheets, income statements and tax returns presented by applicants to assess their ability to generate income sufficient to repay existing and proposed debt  Prepares written proposals that summarize the borrowing request, an analysis of the financial condition of the borrower, the adequacy of collateral, sources of repayment, stress testing, industry comparisons, management experience, and provides recommendations based on analysis  Spreads and analyzes personal and business financial statements  Completes quality assurance reviews  Makes risk rating and structuring recommendations  Actively participate with lending officers in the preparation of commercial loan proposals for committee presentation  Performs annual reviews or financial analysis reviews as needed on existing commercial loans  Reviews appraisals, inspections, environmental or other reports and advises of notable call outs  Assists management in the review and approval of small business loans as prepared by loan processors, within level of authority  Assumes additional responsibilities as requested 

Knowledge, Skills And Abilities

 Must be able to separate and understand various elements of financial statements and tax returns and determine the probability that the conditions of the loan request will be met  Strong analytical, critical thinking, and decision making skills  Knowledge of commercial products, market trends, commercial loan procedures and related federal regulations  Advanced skills with Microsoft Office Suite including Outlook, Word, and Excel  Must have excellent written and verbal communication skills  Must be able to perform credit analysis with and without the assistance of a commercial loan origination system Ability to multitask, prioritize and work independently  Ability to meet strict deadlines 

Education And Experience

 Bachelor’s degree with emphasis on accounting, finance, economics, or business or equivalent experience.  Approximately 2-4 years commercial credit analysis experience in a banking or credit union environment. 

Chartway offers a competitive salary and a comprehensive benefits package. Candidates must have a good credit history for consideration. Salary requirements must be included and resumes must be accompanied by a Chartway Employment Application for consideration.

Chartway Federal Credit Union is an EOE/M/F/ Disability/Vet Employer.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
